attributes.title: don’t waste your time. just awful.
attributes.review:
This app, to put it nicely, is just a pile of steaming garbage. It is not worth the download, because you will want to delete it right away. Too many glitches and too much negativity from small minded Oompa Loompa lovers. I wouldn’t let anyone who actually uses this app seriously touch me with a 10-foot pole. 

Wear your masks and remember that BLM 😚

attributes.title: I hate you Donald trump
attributes.review: As soon has I open this app I saw the ugliest hot Cheetos In this I saw a ugly fat demon who just do noting but make fun of people and hasn’t done anything great for America and if you’re black or Hispanic or a colored person you’re really really really really really really really stupid and I don’t recommend this stupid app my phone  is burning cuz of the ugly hot Cheetos (Blacks and Hispanics life matter)

attributes.title: This app was so terrible
attributes.review: I got this app because I wanted to see what all the boomers and Karen’s were blabbing about, but as soon as I got onto the app it showed an orange Cheeto 🟧 with wrinkles and it made me feel uncomfortable. 😖😳It got even worse though. After I didn’t want to support the orange 🟧 it started to glitch super bad and then gave me a virus.🦠I do not recommend getting this app.

attributes.title: Black Lives Matter
attributes.review:
There is nothing good about this app,the quality is terrible and I got 4 viruses in the last hour,DO NOT GET THIS APP

Why do we have president who is racist and a rapist,I know that is not the America I want to live in after all I am the next generation

NO LIVES CAN MATTER UNTIL BLACK LUVES MATTER, and to all the Karen's out there who believe that blue lives matter you are WRONG it is not a blue live it is a blue shirt

attributes.title: My hope has been destroyed
attributes.review: I am appalled to say the least. The quality of this app was significantly beneath my expectations after taking into account that Donny payed for it with his own personal (undeserved) currency. My greatest regret in life BY FAR is, without a doubt, downloading this application onto my expansive piece of technology that the apple employees worked so diligently at creating 🥺.

attributes.title: Note from the future
attributes.review: I am from year 2050 and this needs to end. Year 2020 is messed up enough we don’t need this app too. This app is total and complete trash. Let alone the fact it does nothing but bring embarrassment to all. The only thing that can save you now is the Gen Zs. Millennials follow in there steps and hopefully it will all end well. ✊ Gen z

attributes.title: Nasty
attributes.review:
When I opened this app I was expecting to find a way to talk to our president about how much me and my fellow Gen Z’s despised him. But instead I had to sign in. But before I had the chance my friend YEETED my IPhone and yelled at me for downloading it for twelve hours. I now take herapy lessons. 

It had come to my mind that President Bum should be respected. So I decided to come to my senses and rate his crusty app. 

Not Trump 2020

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: when i first downloaded this app my phone started to glitch and would randomly turn off. this app has given me tons of viruses and bugs on my new phone. not only did it hurt my phone, but it hurt me. i downloaded the app to try and find a reason to support trump but he has done nothing but harm this country and this app proved it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!

attributes.title: doesn’t work properly
attributes.review:
i downloaded this app bc i wanted to see if i could vote t*ump off this planet but it didn’t work, very disappointing. why is it called t*ump 2020 if it doesn’t even work by removing him off the planet by 2020. i guess i’ll have to find another app :(. also the app just screamed rac¡$m and p3d0ph¡la. and we DO NOT support that 😤
n e way stan ateez and heize for clear skin 😝
